text: Virginia Leith (October 15, 1925 â€“ November 4, 2019) was an American actress. She was known for her leading roles in On the Threshold of Space, Toward the Unknown, Violent Saturday and A Kiss Before Dying. She dated actor Marlon Brando in 1956. Leith died on November 4, 2019 at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:Actors from Cleveland Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:2019 deaths
title: Virginia Leith
